query:
ALTER TABLE `ai_drift_metrics_history` 
ADD COLUMN `accuracy` decimal(10,6) AFTER `model_id`,
ADD COLUMN `accuracy_drop` decimal(10,6) AFTER `accuracy`,
ADD COLUMN `feature_drift` decimal(10,6) AFTER `accuracy_drop`,
ADD COLUMN `prediction_drift` decimal(10,6) AFTER `feature_drift`,
ADD COLUMN `severity` varchar(20) AFTER `prediction_drift`,
ADD COLUMN `timestamp` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AFTER `severity`;
